item.title: Still need help O_o... Player walking
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

O_o… My thread got knocked onto page 13 without a single reply. :rolleyes:

I don’t know how much information I can give you.

Just name the information which I need to give you, and I’ll provide it <.<

I’m not asking for you to do it FOR me. I’m just asking for a bit of help.

I’ve been trying to make it so that if a player clicks on a ladder, they have to be in a certain spot… If they’re not then to make them walk to that spot.

This is my attempt so far.

Code: [Select]
} else if (objectID == 11740) {
if (isNextTo(2954, 3388) == true) {
setAnimation(828);
toX = absX;
toY = absY;
heightLevel = 1;
break;
} else {
walkTo(2954, 3388);
heightLevel = 1; // Ladder Down
break;
}

Error given:
Logs me out and then teleports me straight up without moving me.

After looking around at several forums, I’ve discovered that the walkTo method is used for NPCs.

If I have to code it myself, that’s fine as well. I just need to know where to start.

Read full topic
